Node.definition: = referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)
= process by which an object loses its ability to reflect light
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= poetic term for gold (זָהָב)
= state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at
= causative action by which humans pour out a liquid or dry substance
= small object ◄ consisting of a variety of stone that is considered precious because of its beauty and scarcity; ► used as ornament or decoration; ≈ association with honor, majesty, and glory
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
literally: head; hence: = the topmost part of a vertically oriented object, such as a mountain, and the principal part of an horizontally oriented object, such as a street or a bed
= area outside of living quarters; ► used as thoroughfare

literally: children of a town, region, nation; hence: = people, animals, or products that are inhabitants of or originating from a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the offspring of that place
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= state in which humans or objects are considered valuable and desirable

= referent to the way in which an event is performed; ► normally with the intention of finding out how, but often used in rhetorical questions in order to express one's conviction that that event in question cannot be performed at all (under the given circumstances)
= to hold the opinion that a particular object, person, or event is to be identified with, considered similar to, or to be equated with another object, person, or event
= earthenware vessel, ► used as a storage container for liquids like wine and olive oil
= container ◄ made of baked clay; ► used for household activities, in sacrificial rituals, and for the storage of documents; ≈ regarded as of low value
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= a person who makes pottery out of fired clay

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

= animal looking like a longhaired dog with a pointed nose; yellowish brown in color with red tips to the fur on the back and a bushy tail; produces mournful sounds; ≈ used mainly in poetry and associated with death, destruction, and devastation, but also with mourning and weeping

Node.gloss: to take off|to take out|to remove|to draw out
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or animals partially or completely remove an object that used to be attached to another object
= one of the breasts of a woman or other female mammal
= action by which a human or animal mother feeds her newborn child from her breasts
= offspring of wild, carnivorous mammals
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= pertaining to being without mercy towards humans and animals

= large bird with underdeveloped wings so that itcannot fly; it has a long neck and long legs and is about 2 meters tall; its head and neck are almost bald, being covered in short bristles; the male's body is black with long white feathers on its wings; its tail is white, gray, or light brown; the females are a uniform grayish brown; they feed mainly on seeds, fallen fruit, and shoots and may occasionally eat a lizard or a frog; they live in small flocks of about twenty, of which four or five are males; as many as ten females may lay their eggs in the one nest, but only one female and one male will incubate the eggs, with the female on the nest in the daytime, and the male taking over later in the afternoon; male ostriches make a series of deep booming hoots that can be heard great distances and which are often mistaken for the roar of a lion; ◄ |iStruthio camelus; |i*≈ associated with heartless cruelty because most females do not hatch their own eggs and do not take care of their own young
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= state in which an object is positioned around or against another object in such a way that the two cannot be separated easily
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
= a child that is still drinking milk from its mother's breasts
= upper part of mouth cavity; ◄ part of human body
= state in which someone senses a feeling of needing or wanting to drink, ► which eventually leads to weakness or even death; ≈ also used in a figurative sense to denote a longing or desire
= a person of a young age, usually before puberty
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= action by which humans or animals spread out part of their body

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= things, such as food or certain events, that bring about extreme joy to humans
= area outside of living quarters; ► used as thoroughfare

Node.gloss: to be brought up|to be raised
Node.definition: = process of being raised and educated from childhood to grown age
= crimson yarn, made with a dye derived from a small worm, ≈ associated with the process of atonement for sin and uncleanness, but also with wealth

Node.gloss: to embrace > to cling to|to huddle against
Node.definition: = action by which humans take position in the close vicinity of an object as if they were embracing it
= heap of dung, ashes, and other garbage, ◄ probably located outside of a population center; ≈ associated with poverty and low status
= process by which events increase in intensity
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= process by which a human being receives the treatment that is the consequence of a wrongful act that s/he has committed
= town; ◄ located near Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח) ► town where Lot (לֹוט) settled, when he separated himself from Abram (אַבְרָם) destroyed with Gomorrah (עֲמֹרָה)
= causative action by which humans or deities destroy an object completely ◄ as if by turning it completely upside down
= a very short length of time
= process by which a hand makes a turning movement in order to become engaged in an activity
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= state in which an object is without any outward form of physical contamination

= frozen crystallized water vapor in the form of very white flakes which fall as precipitation from the sky and cover the ground during freezing cold weather; as soon as the temperature rises above freezing, it melts and becomes water; ≈ associated with cold, whiteness, or purity
= state in which the skin of humans is extremely light in color ► to the extent that it reflects light

= white fluid; ◄ secreted by women and female mammals; ► for nourishment of their children or young; also used as food for humans; ≈ highly appreciated and considered high quality food; associated with delight, whiteness, purity, wealth, and well being; metaphor for beauty, young age; quality, wealth, and sex
= state in which an object is red or reddish in color; ≈ often associated with beauty
literally: bones; hence: = the physical body of a human being
= a precious stone consisting of corundum in colour varieties varying from deep crimson or purple to pale rose; ≈ regarded as beautiful and valuable
= (semi )precious stone with a deep blue color, possibly sapphire
meaning unsure; possibly: = the outer physical structure of a person
= state in which objects are or appear to be of a dark color
= a black powdery or flaky substance produced by the incomplete burning of organic matter
= the shape of (part of) the body of humans and animals; ≈ mostly used in contexts emphasizing the beauty of someone's face and figure
= process by which humans understand the identity or nature of (other) humans, objects or events
= area outside of living quarters; ► used as thoroughfare
= the thin layer of tissue forming the natural outer covering of the body of a person or animal
= any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength
= process by which objects containing liquid essential to their existence lose these liquids ◄ due to some external or internal cause|= state in which objects are free from moisture
= a single piece of wood taken from a tree, cut and finished, and used for building and construction
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
= state in which humans or animal are fatally wounded with a sharp object
= state of having a lack of food for a period of time, affecting an individual for a short time or a large number of people in a geographical area for a prolonged time (as in famine)

Node.gloss: to pine away|to waste away|to fail
Node.definition: = process by which humans gradually lose their strength to the point of death
= causative action by which humans thrust violently against other humans with a sharp weapon, ► with the aim of wounding them or ending their lives
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state in which humans feel compassion for others, ◄ caused by affection for that person and/or the lack of well being of that person; ► this feeling is usually translated into action
= causative process by which humans prepare food for consumption by immersing it in boiling water for a prolonged period
= posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood
= action by which someone consumes food; ≈ associated with special occasions such as mourning or sickness
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= causative action by which deities, humans, or animals bring an activity to full completion
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which humans and deities experience excitement ◄ caused by anger
literally: to pout our (one's) anger; hence: = action by which deities give full vent to their anger by punishing the offender
literally: kindling of anger; hence: = process by which the anger (אַף) of deities is aroused ◄ like a fire that is kindled
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke

Node.gloss: to set fire on|to set on fire
Node.definition: = action by which someone causes something to start burning, usually with effects on people and nature around; ≈ associated with punishment and judgement

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= action by which people or objects are removed from existence in a violent way ◄ as food that is eaten
= state in which humans are confident with regard to another person or event, which means that this person is believed to be speaking the truth, or that this event is true
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
primarily used in poetry: = the earth as opposed to the sky, with special focus on the area that is inhabited by humans
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= town, formerly referred to as Salem (שָׁלֵם) and Jebus (יְבוּס) located on Mt. Zion (צִיֹּון) territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► conquered by king David (דָּוִד) who made it the capital of his kingdom
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
literally: to pour out blood; hence: = to wound or kill an animate being
= causative action by which humans kill other humans in a violent way, usually involving the shedding of blood, which brings guilt upon the people committing these acts
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= state in which a person or animal is unable to see
= area outside of living quarters; ► used as thoroughfare
= action by which humans cause themselves to be physically contaminated ◄ by getting in direct contact with unclean objects, such as unclean food and blood

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible
= process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, either or not deliberately
= generic designation for any article of clothing
= state in which humans, animals, or objects are regarded by the law as having been contaminated, ► as a result of which they cannot participate in social and religious activities
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, either or not deliberately

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= process by which an action is repeated or continued

Node.gloss: to sojourn|to live as alien|to dwell
Node.definition: = state in which humans live in a place which is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans divide a group of people into smaller groups, ► usually with the intention of assigning a certain duty to some or each of these groups
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
literally: to look at; hence: = action by which humans or deities pay attention to certain matters
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

Node.gloss: to respect|to look upon or treat with favor|to honor
Node.definition: literally: to lift up (someone's) face; hence: = action by which humans or deities show favor or respect to someone, ◄ as if by allowing someone who is looking down out of shame or humility to look up directly into one's face

= a council or a group of older men who act with authority on behalf of or over their people; some represent an entire nation, others manage the affairs at the town level; some provide their leader with counsel; involved in both judicial and military decisions, and participating in cultic ceremonies; ≈ expected to be wise and considered worthy of deference and respect

Node.gloss: to be kindly disposed|to be generous|to be merciful|to be gracious|to pity
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly
literally: (one's) eyes are finished; hence: = process by which someone's eyes become affected by excessive weeping or hardship

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
= state in which a condition does not serve any purpose
= action by which humans watch a certain area waiting expectantly for something to happen|= elevated structure ► from which a watch can be kept over the surrounding countryside
= action by which humans watch and wait attentively and anxiously for something to happen

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= action by which humans keep a close watch on an event
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= central part of a city where people meet and where civic and commercial activities take place, usually at the intersection of streets and roads
= process by which a moment in time is about to happen
= state of having reached the terminal point of an event
= process by which a certain amount of time fully elapses
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
= state of having reached the terminal point of an event
= state in which humans, animals, and things have the ability to move or act with speed ◄ due to lack of weight, agility, strength, training, or energy

exact meaning unknown; possibly: = a grouping of large birds of prey with keen eyesight; ► unclean and therefore not to be eaten; ≈ associated with large size and great strength, ability to fly great distances at high speed; symbol of protection, metaphor for God, but also symbol for death in battle

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)

Node.gloss: to pursue hotly|to chase|to hound|to hunt down
Node.definition: = action by which someone pursue someone else vigorously ◄ as if on fire
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

Node.gloss: to lie in wait|to lay an ambush|to lurk
Node.definition: = to go to a location where one will not be readily seen by others; ► and wait there for an opportunity to seize or attack someone or do something else that is supposed to be done when nobody else can witness it

= the air that is taken in and expelled through the lungs by humans and animals, which makes them live, and which distinguishes them from inanimate objects like idols; ≈ regarded as coming from God; sometimes God is depicted as a breathing being as well
= the two external openings in the nose
= a (non eschatological) ruler appointed by God and anointed with oil by a prophet or priest
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= to be alive in a certain location

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= various locations

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= small, bowl shaped container ► used for drinking; ≈ often used figuratively to denote one's portion in life, received from God
= process by which humans become intoxicated ◄ as a result of having too much alcohol
literally: to uncover oneself; hence: = action by which humans take off their clothes and become naked, ≈ which is regarded as shameful
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
= causative action by which a group of people is forced to leave their country to settle somewhere else for an indefinite amount of time
= action by which deities or humans inflict a penalty on other deities, humans, animals, or objects, usually as retribution for an offence
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
singular only: = the population of a certain location, town, or ethnic group, ◄ referred to as the daughter of that location, town, or ethnic group
= nation; ◄ considered descendants of Esau (עֵשָׂו)
= causative action by which a deity or human being causes certain information to become available to someone else
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
